TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit FormsAuthenticationEventArgs extends System.EventArgs
Public NotInheritable Class FormsAuthenticationEventArgs Inherits EventArgs
public ref class FormsAuthenticationEventArgs sealed : EventArgs

summary.span: 为 FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate 事件提供数据\*\*\*\*。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类用于向**FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate**事件提供事件值并使你能够为当前请求指定自定义标识。The class is used to supply event values to the **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event and to enable you to specify a custom identity for the current request. 使用当前构造对象 并将其传递给**FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate**事件。The constructs a object using the current and passes it to the **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event. 您可以使用 属性将 当前的属性设置 为自定义 对象。You can use the property to set the property of the current to a custom object. 如果未在 **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** 事件期间为属性指定值，则使用 cookie 或 URL 中的 forms 身份验证票证提供的标识。If you do not specify a value for the property during the **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event, the identity supplied by the forms authentication ticket in the cookie or URL is used. 仅**FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate**当身份验证 设置为 ，并且 是应用程序的活动 HTTP 模块时，才引发 FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate 事件。The **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event is only raised when the authentication is set to and the is an active HTTP module for the application. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用 **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** 事件将的属性设置为 具有自定义的对象 。The following code example uses the **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event to set the property of the current to a object with a custom . [!code-csharp[System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule/CS/global.asax#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.FormsAuthenticationModule/VB/global.asax#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用作为属性的值提供的构造对象 `context` 。The constructs a object using the supplied `context` as the value for the property. 然后，将该 对象传递给 **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** 事件。It then passes the object to the **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用 属性将 当前的属性设置 为自定义 对象。You can use the property to set the property of the current to a custom object. 如果未在 **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** 事件期间为属性指定值，则使用 cookie 或 URL 中的 forms 身份验证票证提供的标识。If you do not specify a value for the property during the **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event, the identity supplied by the forms authentication ticket in the cookie or URL is used. ## Examples 下面的示例使用 **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** 事件将 当前的属性设置 为 具有自定义的对象 。The following example uses the **FormsAuthentication_OnAuthenticate** event to set the property of the current to a object with a custom .
